page.title: 14UPPER DODDENHILL FARM.
page.content: MRS JACKMAN LIVES AT THE FARM WITH HER HUSBAND,TONY,HER DAUGHTER SAMANTHA(12) AND HER MOTHER.SHE HAS LIVED THERE FOR 40 YRS.SHE HAS 2 GREY PONIES,1PALOMINO AND 1 BROWN.THE BROWN ONE IS 2 MONTHS OLD,THE PALOMINO IS 18 YRS AND THE GREYS ARE 11YRS AND 6YRS.THEIR NAMES ARE KITTY,SHERRY,ORINGTON MISS MUFFET AND DODDENHILL HARRIET.ONE IS FOR RIDING, ONE FOR JUMPING AND RIDING, ONE FOR GYMKHANA AND ONE IS A WELSH PONY WITH A FOAL THAT ENTERS SHOWS IN HAND.THEY HAVE 3 PADDOCKS FOR THE PONIES.THEY EAT GRASS, HAY, OATS AND BREAD.THEY HAVE 6 STABLES AND KEEP THE PONIES AS A HOBBY AND TO STOP THEM BEING SOLD FOR MEAT.THEY ALSO KEEP HENS,DUCKS AND A DOG AND CAT.THIS YEAR THE PONIES HAVE BEEN TAKEN TO 9 SHOWS SO FAR.
